channel.title: Phone Movies Mom on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Phone Movies Mom on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: all influence is immoral
item.description: I am watching wonder boys right now. it is so good. three movies I really enjoy are pirates of the caribbeans, wonder boys and o brother, where art thou. those movies are so good. I love them. heh. I LOVE johnny depp. heh. so good. I wish I could act like him forever. but alas.. I can’t. today I went to the dentist and I later went shopping with my mom.
